ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Update?
ygData.msgSnippet: Original game documentation, as well as the official hint book clearly state the spells have a 2 second stun affect. ... From: HiFi Review
ygData.messageBody:
Original game documentation, as well as the official hint book clearly state
the spells have a 2 second stun affect.

-----Original Message-----
From: HiFi Review [mailto:hifireview@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 3:50 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanter Update?


From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>


> Direct damage spells that ahve "stuns" that don't
> work, yet cause us to ahve
> total resists instead of partial ones and a higher
> overall resist rate.
>


Where in the game does it say these spells are supposed to stun? You
may have read this description on someone's web page, but I doubt
anyone at Verant said that it would stun. I seem to recall them saying
that the spells would shock rather than stun. The shock effect causes
a spellcaster to be interrupted. Try it on a spell casting mob. I've
gotten it to work on Orc oracles. Hit one of the chaos flux types as
soon as you see their grubby little hands glow and you can fizzle their
spell.
